casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Harvey Lee STEVENS, Jr. 291P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 1, 2019 Christopher W. Brooks, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Blair E. Cody, III, Attorney at Law, Hickory, for Stevens, Harvey Lee (Jr.). David Learner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*908The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of August 2019 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of August 2019."
